plugins.name: specsmith
plugins.description: Create and manage thorough implementation specs with discovery interviews, deep research, and phased execution. Use /specsmith new, /specsmith switch, /specsmith resume to juggle parallel work streams.

plugins.name: uispec
plugins.description: Two-skill system for UI specifications. Backend skill syncs openapi.yaml, endpoint specs, and component patterns after API changes. Frontend skill reads specs to guide component development. Commands: /uispec-init, /uispec-sync, /uispec-validate.
